title: Opinion on novel coronavirus COVID-19 as a health issue India 2020
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Staying alert and taking precautions and lowest at Response Don't know much about coronavirus.
The highest value at Response Staying alert and taking precautions is 24.0x times more than the lowest value at Don't know much about coronavirus.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Staying alert and taking precautions and lowest at Response Don't know much about coronavirus.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Staying alert and taking precautions and lowest at Response Don't know much about coronavirus.
The highest value at Response Staying alert and taking precautions is 24.0x times more than the lowest value at Don't know much about coronavirus.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Staying alert and taking precautions and lowest at Response Don't know much about coronavirus.
Response Don't know much about coronavirus has 24.0 times less Share of respondents than Response Staying alert and taking precautions which is the highest.
Share of respondents at Response Staying alert and taking precautions is 72.0 , second place is Don't believe it can impact us or Indians at large at 16.0, and thirdly is Can't say at 6.0.
Response Don't know much about coronavirus, and Don't believe it can impact us have a similar Share of respondents that is 3.0.
The highest value 72.0 at Staying alert and taking precautions is almost 3.6 times larger than the average value 20.0.

data.Response: Don't believe it can impact us or Indians at large
Don't believe it can impact us
